*Super Street Fighter II Turbo - New Legacy - Latest version: v0.9 (04/april/2024)*
A rebalance of Super Turbo that also has many quality of life changes!

You can select stage using the START button over character in Character Select Screen (*NOT* the Coin button).
To pick the OLD version of a character, first pick the character with any P/K button, and confirm the character color with START.
If you're getting *DESYNCS* while playing online, please make sure that you and your opponent are both using the latest rom version.

Official Site (English): https://newlegacy.fr
Discord: https://discord.gg/f6HYxyKMmR
Brazilian Discord: https://discord.gg/UMXzgXd6AM

*Street Fighter II - Mix*

Official Site (English): https://sf2mix.github.io

*Please make sure you and your opponent have the same revision!!*

To pick a Secret Character Go to player-side random box and enter start. For player 2 assume left is right.
AKUMA/GOUKI: Down, Down, Down, Left, Left, Left then press LP+HP or LK+HK
VEGA/M.BISON: Down, Down, Left, Left, Down, Left then press LP+HP or LK+HK
DAN: enter LP, LK, MK, HK, HP, MP or enter HP, HK, MK, LK, LP, MP

You can select stage using Coin button over character in Character Select Screen

*How to play Dramatic Battle co-op mode*:
1) Do not use F3 for reset, instead press F2 and then select "Exit".
2) Press and hold the three kicks (KKK) at the title screen, then press start. P1 should pick first.

A recolored version of KOF97. Bosses unlocked. Allows you to choose the same character more than once for the team.
At the start of the fight, the player in Advanced mode already has 3 Power Bars.
In Extra mode you can instantly fill the power bar the first three times you press LP+LK+HP.
A version of KOF97 with another balance. Bosses unlocked. Allows you to choose the same character more than once for the team. The Power bar is infinite.

A version of KOF97 with another balance. The characters have new moves. Bosses unlocked.
The Power bar is infinite. Iori Yagami wears Another Iori's outfit.
The characters have new moves. Bosses unlocked. Kyo Kusanagi wears his Nests Saga outfit.

Infinite power bar. Just hit or take a hit to fill it in Advanced mode, or press LP+LK+HP to fill it in Extra mode.
Characters change color between matches. Hold START in the middle of match to change your character.

Bosses unlocked. Krizalid is below the roulette wheel.
Highlight Krizalid and hold Start + any attack button to select him without a coat.
Bosses unlocked: Krizalid, Zero and Igniz. Ron and Glugan can be used as Strikers.

Password Notation:
1, 2, 3 - LP, MP, HP
4, 5, 6 - LK, MK, HK
Delete - Left Button

Max LVL Tessa: 46321 23544
Max LVL Leo: 41545 44142
Max LVL Mai-Ling: 13126 44354
Max LVL Kenji: 63141 24524

If you load up the game for the first time and you get an error that says NO CD-ROM DRIVE, go to "Input", select "Map game inputs", and change region to 0x53

Password Notation:
1, 2, 3 - LP, MP, HP
4, 5, 6 - LK, MK, HK
Delete - Left Button
ROMHACK CHANGES:
- All Stages Unlocked (+ 3 Final Stages added to VS Mode)
- Removed Timer from a Password Input Window
- Password System was Significantly Simplified:
- JUST INPUT 11111 11111 FOR MAX LVL
- For more information, Visit: https://archive.org/details/RedearthMaxLVLRomhack
